mapper.select: SELECT r.registration_id, r.user_id, r.subject_id, r.site_id, r.session_id, r.seat_number, r.status, r.create_time, sub.subject_name, site.site_name, ses.session_name, ses.exam_date, ses.start_time, ses.end_time FROM exam_registration r LEFT JOIN exam_subject sub ON r.subject_id = sub.subject_id LEFT JOIN exam_site site ON r.site_id = site.site_id LEFT JOIN exam_session ses ON r.session_id = ses.session_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam_registration (user_id, subject_id, site_id, session_id, seat_number, status, create_by, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{subjectId}, #{siteId}, #{sessionId}, #{seatNumber}, #{status}, #{createBy}, sysdate())
mapper.update: UPDATE exam_registration SET status = #{status}, update_time = sysdate() WHERE registration_id = #{registrationId}
